name: Closed Circle
description:
Originally meant as an entry for the 50th Ludum Dare Game Jam.

Trapped in a mysterious temple because of your curiosity (and greed!), you only have a limited amount of time before it traps you forever!

Changelog Miscellany
  • Added Windows download
v1.0.1
  • Fixed chests not yielding item
  • Moved copyright text on title screen
  • Repositioned score
Controls Arrow keys Move Space bar Interact/Punch Rocks D Pause EscapeQuit Game Tools
  • Aseprite - Pixel Art
  • Solarus Quest Editor - Game Engine
